failure.message: The response should contain the message 'Pet deleted' expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.name: runScenario["The user successfully adds a pet with a valid ID 1", "Manage pets in the Swagger Petstore API"](2)
testcase.system-out: @happy-path @integration-test Scenario: The user successfully adds a pet with a valid ID 1 &amp#27;[90m# src/test/java/features/integration/sprint1/HU_AddOrUpdateAPetToTheStore.feature:10&amp#27;[0m Test Started &amp#27;[32mGiven &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe user has access to the Swagger Petstore API&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# steps.integration.sprint1.HU_AddANewPetToTheStore.theUserHasAccessToTheSwaggerPetstoreAPI()&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mWhen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe user makes a POST request to &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"pet"&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m with valid pet data, including the name &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"Lucky"&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m, status &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"placed"&amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m and ID &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m"1"&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# steps.integration.sprint1.HU_AddANewPetToTheStore.theUserMakesAPOSTRequestToPetsWithValidPetDataIncludingTheNameLuckyAndID1(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe response should have a status code of &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32m&amp#27;[1m200&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# steps.integration.sprint1.HU_AddANewPetToTheStore.theResponseShouldHaveAStatusCodeOf200(int)&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[32mThen &amp#27;[0m&amp#27;[32mthe response body should contain the ID of the new pet&amp#27;[0m &amp#27;[90m# steps.integration.sprint1.HU_AddANewPetToTheStore.theResponseBodyShouldContainTheIDOfTheNewPet()&amp#27;[0m
